casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 10, 2014

[Cite as 04/1012014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-1506.]

*1461MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2014-0354. In re A.C.

Hamilton App. Nos. C-130416, C-130464, and C-130467, 2014-Ohio-174. This cause is pending before the court as a jurisdictional appeal.

Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of the court of appeals and juvenile court proceedings, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
